timeline.author: afalhambra

timeline.bodyText:
Seems right package structure folder has not been created properly.
It should be org/jbpm/notification/listeners/ but the actual folder is just org.jbpm.notification.listeners
timeline.author: afalhambra
afalhambra
afalhambra

timeline.bodyText: logger expects 3 placeholders but only 2 are provided, also I think there is no harm in using info so we can always see the output when running tests
timeline.author: afalhambra

replies.bodyText: just kept content, as it's the only one meaningful, right
replies.author: gmunozfe

timeline.bodyText: using userInfo will only display a memory address - maybe it's worth to display something more meaningful from userInfo object
